username.title: Username
username.description: Username for BlueAir account. This should be filled in automatically in the discovery process.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for BlueAir account. This should be filled in automatically in the discovery process.

region.title: Region
region.description: Region for BlueAir account. This should be filled in automatically in the discovery process.

accountUuid.title: Account UUID
accountUuid.description: Account UUID for BlueAir account. This should be filled in automatically in the discovery process.

verboseLogging.title: Verbose Logging
verboseLogging.description: Enable to receive detailed log messages. Useful for troubleshooting.

uiDebug.title: UI Debug
uiDebug.description: Enable to show debug information in the Homebridge UI.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: Interval in miliseconds to poll the BlueAir API for updates. It's recommended to keep this at least 5 seconds (5000 miliseconds).

filterChangeLevel.title: Filter Change Level
filterChangeLevel.description: Percentage of filter life remaining to trigger a filter change alert.

led.title: LED
led.description: Toggles if the LED switch service is created with the accessory.

airQualitySensor.title: Air Quality Sensor
airQualitySensor.description: Toggles if the air quality sensor service is created with the accessory.

temperatureSensor.title: Temperature Sensor
temperatureSensor.description: Toggles if the temperature sensor service is created with the accessory.

germShield.title: Germ Shield
germShield.description: Toggles if the germ shield switch service is created with the accessory.

nightMode.title: Night Mode
nightMode.description: Toggles if the night mode switch service is created with the accessory.
